text.p: (Figures in millions of French francs unless stated)
Net financial charges charge 221 vs charge 554

NOTE - Pinault-Printemps-Redoute said in a statement that to the end of February, despite a level of consumption comparable to that seen in the second half of 1996, the group had increased market share. Sales had risen six percent.

"The group will continue to seek improvements in internal productivity and development strategy will be reinforced through all means -- internal and external growth, innovation and international expansion," it said.
